content:
Anyone noticed that the JIRA query function inBallot has stopped working? I have the following I defined a query as follows:
project = "FHIR Specification Feedback" AND issueFunction in inBallot("2021-May - FHIR IG CG R1 STU")

This was working last week, but seems to have stopped? Anyone else having a problem?
I've noticed and confirmed. I haven't had a chance to chase 'why', beyond it's not logging any errors.
Thanks Lloyd :+1:
I've fixed it. Chasing w/ Joshua how come the underlying Jira functionality changed in a way that caused it to break in the first place. Thanks for highlighting the isssue @Kevin Power
